m'mphepete: Kukumana kwa nkhope ziwiri pa mawonekedwe atatu-dimensional
kufanana: Mizere iwiri mu danga la mbali ziwiri yosagwirizana
ndege: Malo athyathyathya a mbali ziwiri pomwe zinthu za mbali ziwiri zimatha kukhala
mfundo: Malo enieni pamzere, ndege, kapena mumlengalenga
mbali: Mizere magawo muzithunzi za geometric zomwe zimalemba kunja kwa chinthucho
vertex: Mfundo yomwe mbali ziwiri za chithunzi cha mbali ziwiri kapena mbali ziwiri za mawonekedwe atatu amakumana
kuzungulira: Maonekedwe a mbali ziwiri momwe mfundo zonse pamzere wokhota zimakhala zofanana kuchokera pakatikati.
makona atatu: Chithunzi chotsekedwa chokhala ndi mbali zitatu
rectangle: Chithunzi cha mbali ziwiri, chotsekedwa, cha mbali zinayi chokhala ndi ngodya zinayi zolondola
lalikulu: Mtundu wapadera wa rectangle womwe uli ndi mbali zofanana ndi mbali zofananira
kyubu: Chithunzi cha mbali zitatu chokhala ndi mabwalo ofanana ngati nkhope
